youtube.title: How Crossed Eye Surgery Works: Strabismus Repair Explained
youtube.description: Discover the incredible procedure behind crossed eye (strabismus) repair. This animation shows how ophthalmologists adjust the eye muscles to restore proper alignment and binocular vision. Perfect for biology students and medical enthusiasts!
